scene_description_enriched: The image displays a decorative border element featuring a stylized griffin. The creature is depicted in profile, with the head of an eagle and the body of a lion, complete with feathered wings and clawed feet. The griffin is rendered in black ink on a light background, with fine lines indicating feathers and fur. The overall impression is one of heraldic or ornamental design, likely part of a larger illuminated manuscript or printed book.
